revised_title: Yield Criterion and Plastic Stress-Strain Relations for Anisotropic Metals
tldr: The authors develop a theory for plane plastic strain in anisotropic metals, formulating a yield criterion and plastic stress-strain relations. They show that the characteristics, which are lines of maximum shear strain-rate, have properties similar to those in isotropic metals. The theory is applied to the problem of indentation by a flat die.
